comments.author: Illconceived Was Na.9781
comments.body: Thanks for the heads up (and especially for being cautious in your estimated times).

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
One of the API backend servers is having a hardware issue; weâ€™re migrating the services to a different machine. By a stroke of bad luck, this machine hosts one of the singleton services that the API needs to function (specifically: the item/recipe/etc whitelists) so everything is broken while we fix the issue.

Should be back up at or around 5PM PST.

EDIT: Nothing horrible happened and they should be back online now.
